data.title: SITUATIONS
questions: In this phase, reflect on what situations presented leadership challenges…
What opportunities did you have (this week) to demonstrate leadership?
How did you handle specific situations or challenges?
What went well? What would you do differently?

data.title: INSIGHTS
questions: In this phase, reflect on what you learned from your leadership challenges…
What else was personally significant for you (during the week)?
What did you learn about yourself? Your boss? Peers? Team?
What insights / a-ha’s did you have? What lessons learned?

data.title: VALUES
questions: In this phase, focus on how to live your values to their fullest…
In what specific ways did you demonstrate your values?
What value(s) do you want to emphasize going forward? How will you?
What are you intentionally doing to build trust, rapport and relationships?
Who do you need to thank, recognize or reward? How?

data.title: PROGRESS
questions: In this phase, review your goals vs. progress, and what you plan to do…
What progress did you make toward your leadership development goals?
What leadership challenges do you foresee (in the coming week)?
How can you better manage yourself, and prepare for each situation?
What goal or skill will you intentionally work on (in the coming week)?
